title: How the Emerald Ash Borer Took Ash Bats Out of Major League Baseball
description: Invasive insects and batter preferences have led to the elimination of the wood that dominated the sport for generations. There may not be a single ash bat used in this postseason.
dc:creator: Zach Schonbrun
media:description: Babe Ruth was known for swinging an extra-large ash bat in his years of domination with the Yankees.
